comments.author: cthecheese.5379
comments.body: Bare with me here, but I want to point out that gaining seconds probably isn’t going to happen, though I am new to the Guild Wars scene and do not know how active the developers are in giving into community requests. For that same reason, it may be a better idea to take a different approach. What are you attempting to do that requires the log messages to have separate times?

comments.author: Mirimmar.4103
comments.body: Yeah, I know, but I don’t know where to put it. If some1 can do that, then thx

comments.author: rodadams.5963
comments.body: What appears in the in game chat window is not the purview of this forum. The API refers to a set of interfaces where we can query the status of game information from somewhere other than the normal game client.

comments.author: Mirimmar.4103
comments.body:
Hi.

I’m developing an app, that will use the text recognition of the log, to do stuff, similar to the Guild Wars 2 Dmg Meter . But I have a small (for you, but big for me) problem. There can be about 30 events logged in the consol, that will have the same timestamp, becouse the timestamp writes only hours and minutes.

Can you add the seconds to that timestamp? Or maybe, there is an option to turn them on and I didn’t find it?

Thx for any reply!
